name: UEC-IsValid-Operation
description: This is a FHIR Operation performed by an EMS. It is performed at the ServiceDefinition resource type level at the start of a triage journey in order to check whether this CDSS is able to provide ServiceDefinitions appropriate for the current journey.

parameter.name: requestId
parameter.documentation: An optional client-provided identifier to track the request.

parameter.name: ODSCode
parameter.documentation: The validity of the CDSS is based on the current patient's registered GP.

parameter.name: evaluateAtDateTime
parameter.documentation: The date time for which the evaluation should be carried out. If not supplied the default is ‘now’.

parameter.name: return
parameter.documentation: The output is a boolean - true if the CDSS is valid for this patient at this time, and false if not.
